title: 20 Minute Full Body Stretch | Deep Stretch for Total Body
description:
Get ready to feel SO GOOD after this deep full body stretch routine. ✨FREE 7-day trial to the Re:Align App: https://www.therealign.co/membership ✨ hundreds of exclusive workouts + nourishing recipes, sound healing meditations, and educational wellness workshops

Yoga Mat: https://amzn.to/3Sv1FxZ

*****
Deanna Dorman is a celebrity Master Trainer, Fitness Nutrition Specialist, and Pilates instructor. Deanna has been featured in Shape, Self, Women's Health, Buzzfeed, and a number of other print and online publications as a leading fitness expert and healthy recipe developer. She is the creator and founder of The Re:Align Collective - an on-demand video app that delivers new workouts every week!


WORKOUT OVERVIEW
0:00 Welcome
1:08 Chair Stretches - Seated Figure Four
3:43 Chair Chest Stretch
5:36 Seated Hamstring Stretch
8:15 Butterfly Stretch
9:43 Double Pigeon Stretch
12:59 Single Leg Pigeon
17:44 Cobra
19:04 Quadriceps Stretch
21:44 Single Side Chest Stretch


#stretching #stretchingexercises #stretchroutine
channelDescription:
FEEL GOOD workouts to Re:Align your Body, Mind, and Soul 

My intention is to help you FEEL GOOD and reach your health goals with Pilates workouts, Yoga, and movements that will strengthen and stretch your beautiful body, nourishing recipes to help you feel energized, and Sound Healing meditations to center your mind.

► GET THE APP FOR EXCLUSIVE WORKOUTS, RECIPES AND MORE - https://www.therealign.co/membership ◄


*****
Deanna Dorman has been a celebrity Master Trainer, Fitness Nutrition Specialist, and Pilates instructor for over 15 years. Deanna has been featured in Shape, Self, Women's Health, Buzzfeed, and a number of other print and online publications as a leading fitness expert and healthy recipe developer. 

DISCLAIMER: Consult a doctor before starting any exercise program. Always warm up thoroughly and stretch after all workouts. TheReAlign.co & Deanna Dorman will not be responsible or liable for any injury sustained while exercising at your home, gym, or elsewhere.

comments:
Enjoyed the stretches and gave a thumbs up 👍🏼 However, if I were to come back to your videos I’d prefer less talk when in the stretches. Ofc all the ques are important, but the constant talk in between was stressing me out a bit and made it harder to connect mentally to the muscles when in the stretches.
Wish you all the best!
